001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.NeuronFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
008
009import java.util.List;
010
011public class AssociationUnit extends Neuron {
012
013    public AssociationUnit(String name, List<Neuron> inputs) {
014        super(name, inputs, new NeuronFunction(LinearCombination.create(inputs.size(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT), Activations.none()));
015    }
016
017}
